text: This is a list of Swedish-language novelists, poets and other writers. __NOTOC__ == A == *John Ajvide Lindqvist (born 1968) *Hans Alfredson (1931–2017) *Karin Alfredsson (born 1953) *Carl Jonas Love Almqvist (1793–1866) *Einar Askestad (born 1964) *Per Daniel Amadeus Atterbom (1790–1855) *Dan Andersson (1888–1920) *Anders Annerfalk (born 1959) *Britt Arenander (born 1941) *Werner Aspenström (1918–1997) *Majgull Axelsson (born 1947) == B == *Carl Michael Bellman (1740–1795) *Victoria Benedictsson (1850–1888) *Frans G.
